scenario_text.value:
Damn. Out of range, just like I thought.
We could’ve called for help.
I don’t see any cell towers...
And your phone?
It’s no good. No signal.

That right... I figured there might be
a chance, given the message I got.
What?! You got a message?!

I mean, but...it’s a bunch of gibberish. And
I’m out of range, so I can’t send jack.
Dammit, what’re we supposed to do, here?
What’s he talking about?

He got a message on his phone, but it’s
indecipherable. He’s just a bit frustrated.
Wow! Show me!

It’s not for you, Agumon!
It’ll break if you toss it around!

Anyway...
My phone hasn’t even lost power...

What? You’re right.
I’m still at full charge, too.

Good job noticing that the power levels
haven’t changed...

I was trying to call for help, of course.
I’ve been much calmer than all of you.
(Ryo’s been using his phone the whole time?)
Who was he calling?
That let him discover that it doesn’t work.
Who were you calling?
What? Does it matter?
It’s just that I could try calling them, too.

Um, it’s my parents. They usually answer if I 
call around this time...
Oh...

It’s good that you noticed this.
Well done, Ryo.

What? Weren’t you listening?
I said we can’t call out.

So now we know there’s no signal here.
That might be useful information.
Thanks, Ryo!

What’re you thanking me for?
We’re still screwed, right?

Whatever...
You’re welcome, I guess.

Anyway, we can’t reach anyone,
so this is hopeless...

We can’t even call the professor?
What’ll happen to us?
Why is this place without signal?
